name: sam (sunspeed)
description:
A two-level game where you go across grasslands. You then go across a forest, and afterwards you succeed in getting in forestland outside

this magnificent game was made with the godot game engine

controls (compatible with gamepad):

space (or X) - jump

z (or Circle) - shove

arrow keys (or D-Pad) - move

double-tap left or right - sprint

other controls (only works in  gameplay, not in menus):

F2 - fullscreen

F1 - display settings
